name: Thrasher (hypercraft games)
description:
Save Ty from Getting Thrashed!!

Run as fast as you can!!

Dodge the Thrashers!!

Help Ty from getting Crushed by the Thrashers in the laboratory.

#BeatThrasherChallenge 

Can you beat the score of 30 in the game? If you can then post a screenshot on any social media with #BeatThrasherChallenge and become one of the most skilful in the world to beat this challenge.

Have you got the ability to beat Thrasher try to do it yourself.

•  Save yourself from getting Thrashed!!

•  Vivid and colourful Graphics.

•  Fun, Amusing and Fast paced gameplay.

•  Casual Styled gameplay.

•   RUN !! To save your Life.

•  Lightning fast Joystickmovement.

•  Beat the #BeatThrasherChallenge.
